scripts.init: cd cdk-ecr && npm install && cd .. && cd cdk-lambda && npm install && cd ..
scripts.push-image-keep-tag: cd build && python3 build_and_deploy.py -tag static-value && cd ..
scripts.deploy-lambda: cd cdk-lambda && cdk deploy --outputs-file stack-data.json && cd ..
scripts.deploy-ecr: cd cdk-ecr && cdk deploy --outputs-file stack-data.json && cd ..
scripts.all-lambda: npm run push-image && npm run deploy-lambda
